com.jswiff.xml
Class Transformer

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.xml.Transformer
public class Transformer
extends java.lang.Object

This class offers simple methods for translation between SWF and XML. If you want more control over the transformation process, use XMLReader with SWFWriter or SWFReader with XMLWriter.

Constructor Summary
Transformer()
           
 
Method Summary
static void toSWF(java.io.InputStream xmlStream, java.io.OutputStream swfStream)
          Transforms XML from an input stream to a SWF, which is written to an output stream.

          Transforms XML read from a reader to a SWF, which is written to an output stream.
static void toXML(java.io.InputStream swfStream, java.io.OutputStream xmlStream, boolean format)
          Transforms an SWF to an XML.
static void toXML(java.io.InputStream swfStream, java.io.Writer writer, boolean format)
          Transforms an SWF to an XML.

Method Detail

toSWF

public static void toSWF(java.io.InputStream xmlStream,
                         java.io.OutputStream swfStream)
                  throws org.dom4j.DocumentException,
                         java.io.IOException
Transforms XML from an input stream to a SWF, which is written to an output stream.

Parameters:
xmlStream - source XML stream
swfStream - target SWF stream
Throws:
org.dom4j.DocumentException - if the XML document couldn't be parsed
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured

toSWF

public static void toSWF(java.io.Reader xmlReader,
                         java.io.OutputStream swfStream)
                  throws org.dom4j.DocumentException,
                         java.io.IOException
Transforms XML read from a reader to a SWF, which is written to an output stream.

Parameters:
xmlReader - source XML reader
swfStream - target SWF stream
Throws:
org.dom4j.DocumentException - if the XML document couldn't be parsed
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured

toXML

public static void toXML(java.io.InputStream swfStream,
                         java.io.OutputStream xmlStream,
                         boolean format)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Transforms an SWF to an XML. The SWF is read from an input stream, the generated XML is written to an output stream. If the format flag is set, the output XML is formatted to make it more readable.

Parameters:
swfStream - source SWF stream
xmlStream - target XML stream
format - specifies whether to format the output XML
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured

toXML

public static void toXML(java.io.InputStream swfStream,
                         java.io.Writer writer,
                         boolean format)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Transforms an SWF to an XML. The SWF is read from an input stream, the generated XML is written to a writer. If the format flag is set, the output XML is formatted to make it more readable.

Parameters:
swfStream - source SWF stream
writer - writer used to write generated XML
format - specifies whether to format the output XML
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured
